resources.string: Calibrate with at least an acidic, basic and neutral Ph.
Place yellow pointer over un-dipped pH strip and white on colored region.

The application works best for universal indicator ph strip, for the range 1–14.

Use ambient white light and 10 µl test solution for better results.

Avoid shadow over the testing strip.

Developed in CSIR-CSIO, by Sankho Turjo Sarkar (sturjo@csio.res.in), Ritesh Kumar, Saurav Kumar, Anupama Sharma, Monika Singla, and Amol P Bhondekar of Food Processing Instrumentation Lab (Agrionics).

This app is for educational purposes. CSIR-CSIO will not be held responsible for any damages caused due to this app.
